Description:
Fully-Optioned & Ready to Relish!
In a family-focused quiet neighbourhood this distinctive 4 bedroom residence combines
an exceptional floor plan with impressive inclusions to deliver a ready-made brand new environment of quality, convenience & versatile style.
Beyond the impressive resort style facade, discover an immaculate & cleverly zoned interior showcasing a huge master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite with upgraded fixtures & stone bench top, 3 large additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes) & main family striking bathroom. Add to this a spacious open-plan living/dining area with lush garden views from every window served by a well- appointed kitchen with stone benchtops, waterfall stone island bench, soft closing draws, Bosch self-cleaning oven, Bosch cooktop, Rangehood, Dishwasher & butler pantry with under mount sink.
Other stand-out features include Refrigerated zoned cooling & Heating for all seasons comfort, 2700mm high-ceilings, alarm system with Wi-Fi, video intercom. Floating laminate flooring, self-wash close toilets, LED strip lights to kitchen overheads including butler's pantry, floor to ceiling tiles in power room & bathrooms remote garage with internal access, family sized laundry with added storage & stone benches.
Step outside & be greeted by a wonderful backyard garden with fully landscaped gardens and an al-fresco entertaining area with quality. All this in a blue ribbon location, within close proximity to all of Craigieburn amenities, public transport, Highlands Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Central as well as easy access to YMCA childcare, Newbury Primary, Mount Ridley College & Hume Anglican Grammar.
Insights: 57 Juscelina Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
A Flawless Integration of Space & Family Comfort!
Be seduced by this quality built Henley home which is sure to tick every single box on your must-have wish list.
Flanked by beautifully landscaped gardens, walk up towards its impressive grand facade & enter a home that is sure to impress with its vast living spaces, bright interior & warm family character & charm.
A flexible sun-drenched floor plan offering 4 great sized bedrooms, walk-in robe & ensuite to a large master bedroom, spacious dual living zones with separate formal lounge, super-sized meals & family area perfect for large-scale family gatherings, fully equipped kitchen with great storage, walk-in pantry & ample Ceasar Stone bench space.
Step outside & be pleasantly surprised by the homes showpiece entertainers alfresco deck which effortlessly links up to the home to provide the ultimate in indoor & outdoor integration. It also provides lush emerald green grass which will be the perfect haven for kids to play until their heart's content in complete privacy.
Located to perfection, within close proximity to local schools, Highlands Shops, transport & jam-packed with quality extras including ducted heating, zoned refrigeration cooling, double remote garage, sparkling central bathroom, roomy laundry & much much more!
Homes like this do not come up often, so call now & be the proud new owner of this sensational offering.
Insights: 6 Landor Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
One more SOLD by SKAD !! Without any marketing Cost !!
This block site is the perfect position to build a distinguished family home that will have some of the best views to the Melbourne skyline that you will ever see. Situated close to Hume Grammar, Hume Highway, Craigieburn Central, Mt. Ridley College and other important amenities, this large parcel of land will suit all house types. With a limited number of blocks in this prestigious estate available, now is the time to capitalise on this wonderful opportunity.
Land with city views (Panorama Views) and without easement!!
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.

Description:
Prestigious Family Home In Most Sorted Aston Estate !!!!
Universal Real Estate Vic proudly presents this conveniently positioned house with close proximity to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Public Transport, Schools and parklands. Well equipped with all the bells and whistles to impress first home buyers or even the savviest of Investors.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: 4 Spacious Bedrooms (Master Bedroom with Walk in Robe and Full Ensuite, other 3 Bedrooms with full mirror door BIR serviced by a spacious central bathroom with bath tub.)
- KITCHEN: Spacious Open Plan Living/ Dining Kitchen with 900 mm Stainless Steel Appliances, stone benchtops, Electric Oven, Double Fridge Space and ample of cupboards.
- LIVING AREA: Open Plan Living/Dining Area
- HEAT/COOL: Ducted Heating and Evaporative Cooling.
- LAUNDRY: Spacious Laundry with ample cupboard space.
- PARKING: Double Car Garage with remote control access, Internal access to house.
- BACKYARD: Low Maintenance beautiful backyard with Veggie patches.
- ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS:
-High Ceilings,
-Downlights,
-Linen Cupboards
-Alfresco with Wooden Decking
-Custom Blinds and much more .....
- LOCATION: Walking distance to Aston Reserve. Close proximity to Aitken Creek Primary School, Willmott Primary School, Our Lady's Primary School , Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Junction, Craigieburn Golf Course Supermarkets, Gym, Traffic Park, Volcano Park, Splash Aqua Park Leisure Centre. Easy access to bus stops, beautiful parklands, Child Cares, Service Stations, Restaurants/CafÃÂ© and Hume Freeway.
If you're in the market for that perfect all round property, then look no further than this.
Don't miss out! Call Gordon Garg - 0433 897 397 or Robbie Sandhu - 0466 074 580.

Description:
Corner Block Opportunity Awaits
Located in one of Craigieburn's most ideal pockets and sitting on a generous parcel of land measuring 583m2 (approx.) with the potential to subdivide (Subject to Council Approval) the opportunities are endless for the keen investor or home buyer!
Offering three great sized bedrooms, spacious lounge, equipped with open plan kitchen/meals/living area and central bathroom, extras include heating, cooling, ample backyard with shed, pergola, side access and more!
Providing easy stress free living, located in a prized, quiet and family friendly location, and is within a walking distance to Craigieburn Plaza, public transport, shops, schools and parkland. Inspection is a must!
*** COVID-19 Private property inspection rules ***
If you're attending a private inspection, you must only attend if you are fit and healthy to do so, have no reason to think that you have been contaminated and are not under any self-isolation conditions. There is a maximum of two people allowed to attend and you must maintain social distancing requirements at all times. Please don't touch anything inside the property. If you would like to view something in particular, please request the agent's assistance. Hand sanitiser and disposable gloves will be provided for you before entering the home and we will insist that you use them. Thank you for your understanding.

Description:
A Massive Family Entertainer on 770m2*
Surrounded by other quality homes in a secluded Woodland Park cul-de-sac, this single-level
sensation delivers an aspirational family lifestyle with its outstanding versatility, brilliant entertaining spaces & landscaped garden surrounds.
An oasis of quality and privacy, the home's free-flowing interior showcases 3 main bedrooms
(extra-large master with walk-in robe & ensuite, theatre room (or fourth bedroom) & stylish family bathroom complete with double vanity & floor-to-ceiling tiles.
With an emphasis on entertaining, the home also boasts a versatile rumpus/lounge, vast open-
plan living/dining area & stone-top kitchen with stainless steel appliances & ample cupboard
space, plus a billiard room, gymnasium or home office (with kitchenette) & stacker doors to an enclosed al-fresco style entertaining area.
Along with ducted heating & evaporative cooling, the home also includes a large laundry &
remote-control double garage with internal entry, wonderfully wide backyard with extensive
paving & manicured hedges for added privacy, plus a landscaped sideway garden complete
with decking, large storage shed, 2000L watertank (to the cisterns) & drip irrigation system
front & rear.
The open spaces of Malcolm Creek parkland & endless walking/cycling trails at the end of the
street, it's also close to local buses & Mount Ridley College, as well as both Highlands &
Craigieburn Central shopping centres.
Insights: 18 Beckett Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2005 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Stylish Low Maintenance Living
This contemporary double storey three-bedroom townhome offers an incredible lifestyle opportunity. The thoughtfully designed floorplan features clever zoning, with the living areas on ground floor level and the bedrooms situated on the first floor.
Ground floor comprises an open plan kitchen/meals area with stone benchtops and Smeg stainless steel appliances, while the adjoining light and bright living area features timber flooring as well as split system reverse cycle heating and cooling. A convenient powder room and laundry complete this level. On the first floor, the 3 carpeted bedrooms, all featuring built in robes, are positioned around the modern family bathroom, while the main bedroom has its own en-suite bathroom and split system heating/cooling.
The location is perfectly suited to families with an incredible playground just steps from the front door. The immediate area offers multiple educational facilities and sporting amenities while the Craigieburn Central complex, with all of its retail outlets, cafes and restaurants is also within close proximity.
Homes in this prized position are tightly held, making this an opportunity not to be missed!
Property Features:
Modern, low maintenance living
3 bedrooms
2 bathrooms plus powder room
Double storey
Smeg appliances + stone benchtops
Private, rear courtyard
Single lock up parking and rear access
Quiet position overlooking parkland
Insights: 33 Channel Walk, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
"Why Pay Rent": INSPECTION BY APPOINTMENT ONLY
In a premier position with instant success to parkland & public transport, this two-level townhouse delivers a contemporary lifestyle of quality.
The ground floor showcases a formal lounge upon entry, light filled open living, dining and kitchen area featuring stone bench-tops, stainless steel appliances and ample cupboard space.
Upstairs you will be welcomed by study nook and two generous sized bedrooms all with built in robes.
Other features of the home include 2 split systems heating & cooling, laundry & guest toilet downstairs, plus a roomy private rear courtyard & secure double remote-control garage.
Also close to Craigieburn Central Shopping centre, local schools & childcare facilities, endless walking/cycling trails, as well as public transport & major arterial roads.

Description:
Class, Convenience & Parkland Proximity
Moments from the buzz of Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, this modern tri-level townhouse delivers an exceptional low-maintenance lifestyle with its intelligent floorplan, quality features throughout & green open spaces literally at your doorstep.
Bathed in northerly light, the home's impressive interior boasts a large top-floor master bedroom with walk-in robe, stylish ensuite & private balcony with elevated outlook, as well as a second bedroom (also with ensuite) & guest powder room (third WC).
Dual living zones include a separate lounge & spacious open-plan living/dining area
accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen with tiled splashbacks, stainless steel cooking
appliances & dishwasher.
Split-system heating & cooling provide year-round comfort, along with the added appeal of
high ceilings & stone benchtops throughout, plus a large undercover terrace (from the living
area), European laundry, dedicated storeroom & wide single garage with internal entry.
Immediate access to a choice of bus routes, Splash Leisure Centre & Anzac Park's renowned
recreational facilities, it's also close to Malcolm Creek trails along with a choice of popular primary & secondary schools. Outstanding modern living!
Insights: 7 Cohen Walk, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 39 other 2 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Indulge In Luxury, Space & Family Comfort!
Enjoy a spacious double-storey layout with exceptional features throughout this free-flowing 4-bedroom Porter Davis home ready and waiting to accommodate the modern family!
With contemporary low-maintenance gardens at the front and rear of a landscaped block, style and quality shine both inside and out of this modern showpiece.
The multiple living zones of this as-new floor plan include a personal theatre room, huge upstairs rumpus, front study/lounge and an expansive open plan living and dining area, with stunning floorboards continuing into the impressive stone benchtop kitchen featuring a grand centre island, soft-close drawers, modern appliances and a butlers pantry.
Step upstairs to find a luxurious master bedroom boasting 2 separate walk-in wardrobes and an exquisite double ensuite. Theres an additional walk-in to another of the large bedrooms and built-ins to the rest, each serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet.
Sliding doors open out to a light-filled rear deck with pergola, offering a perfect sanctuary for outdoor entertaining within your private low-maintenance garden. An additional powder room is located across from the full laundry downstairs, with internal and rear access provided through the remote-control double garage.
Secure an enviable family lifestyle in the sought-after Mt Aitken precinct with local schools, shops, Craigieburn Central, parks and walking trails all within minutes. Easy access to public transport and major arterial roads makes short work of commuting.
This is fully optioned family living at its absolute best, with every element of this fantastic layout just oozing style and luxury. Call Mario Pejovski on 0490 815 914 to arrange your inspection today!
Features
- Ducted Gas Heating (Zoned)
- Evaporative Cooling To Both Levels
- Security System & Video Intercom
- NBN & Data Cabling

Description:
A touch of luxury
An aspirational family lifestyle located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & premium streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all amenities close by including Craigieburn Central, Stockland shopping centre, public transport and local schools. This home really is the complete package
In an area renowned for its exceptional lifestyle benefits this impressive home sets a new benchmark in quality, design and sophistication. It offers 4 bedrooms, two designer bathrooms and a relaxing outdoor decking area that deliver luxurious and enviable contemporary living.
spacious kitchen with SSA and plenty pf cupboard space, spacious adjoining meals area.
Expansive master bedroom with en-suite and W.I.R Luxury fittings and fixtures including ducted heating, split cooling, alarm and high ceilings
double remote garage with internal and external access
Low maintenance Gardens complementing a massive outdoor decking area and courtyard
Located in a quiet street within minutes of everything Craigieburn has to offer, this free standing residence offers the ultimate indoor and outdoor family experience.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
A Dazzling Ex-Display Full of Elegance & Opulence
A former marquee Henley display residence, this 5 bedroom modern masterpiece delivers the ultimate family lifestyle with its vast & versatile floorplan, premium upgrades throughout & landscaped gardens all-round.
A spectacular fusion of quality, class & contemporary tones, the home's bold & beautiful
interior showcases an extra-large master bedroom with private ensuite & dressing room, 4
additional bedrooms (all with walk-in robes), deluxe family bathroom & 2 powder rooms (one on each level).
Add to this a separate lounge/TV room, large rumpus (upstairs) & expansive open-plan living/dining area serviced by a gourmet kitchen with 40mm Caesarstone island benchtop, glass splashback, Technika appliances (dual wall ovens, 900mm 5-gurner gas cooktop, built-in microwave, built-in Bertazzoni coffee machine, dishwasher & large butler's pantry.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating & refrigerated cooling, gas-log fireplace (living area), security system, quality carpets & engineered floors, large laundry & exceptional storage spaces across both levels.
Double bi-folds reveal a fabulous al-fresco entertaining deck complete with gas-stone feature fireplace, plus front balcony, delightful backyard garden & remote-control double garage with internal access.
Moments from Highlands Shopping Centre, Grand Boulevard buses, Malcolm Creek parkland & endless trails, it's close to some of Craigieburn's most popular schools including Mount
Ridley College, Mother Teresa Catholic Primary School & Hume Anglican Grammar, as well
as easy access to the Hume Freeway. Truly the best of the best!

Forthcoming Auction - Date to be Advised
FOR A PRIVATE INSPECTION PLEASE CONTACT THE AGENT DIRECTLY this is in order to protect the Community and in line with advice received from the WHO and Australian Government.
Spectacularly set over two floors, this ultra-modern 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom family townhouse offers low-maintenance luxury with affordable entry-level value.
Discover roomy and radiant open-plan living/dining, and a stone-topped kitchen with a handy breakfast bar and quality stainless-steel appliances plus a dishwasher.
Enjoy a north-facing alfresco for entertaining, a versatile upstairs retreat, extensive heating/cooling, and a remote-controlled double garage offering internal access.
3 large bedrooms, main with private ensuite, balcony and WIR, 2 with BIR

Thoughtfully designed, walk to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, bus routes, lush parkland, and a choice of quality primary and secondary schools.

Description:
Mt Ridley Living on 848m2
Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented home offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character for all home buyers alike.
Offering a fully equipped kitchen with, stainless steel appliances, main bathroom, large master bedroom with built in robe and ensuite, open plan meals and family area, formal lounge with adjoining rumpus room, a separate study, double garage with drive thru access and much more. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight, complete with outdoor entertaining area and a HUGE backyard all sitting on a MASSIVE block of 848m2 (approx.).
A host of extras include high ceilings, ducted heating & split system cooling, beautifully maintained carefree gardens and more. All this offering a blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's sought after pockets, The Mt Ridley Estate is within close proximity to the CBD, local schools, parkland, public transport, shops & sporting facilities. BE QUICK TO ARRANGE AN INSPECTION FOR THIS ONE!

Description:
Single-Level Style with Amazing Space
In a quiet & convenient Highlands neighbourhood, this freestanding home provides an idyllic
environment for growing and extended families with its spacious single-level floorplan, quality inclusions & substantial outdoor area to enjoy.
An outstanding lifestyle or investment opportunity, the home's impressive interior comprises 4 main bedrooms (extra-large master with walk-in robe & private ensuite), along with a separate study/5th bedroom & main family bathroom.
Filled with natural light, the versatile open-plan living/dining area is accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen complete with stone benchtops, walk-in pantry, stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher.
Ducted heating & split-system air conditioning add to the appeal, along with efficient LED
lighting, solar hot water & double-glazed windows all-round, plus an outdoor al-fresco
entertaining area, wide backyard garden with extensive paving & remote-control double
garage with internal entry.
A short stroll to Malcolm Creek parkland & endless trails, public transport & Highlands
Shopping Centre, it's close to some of Craigieburn's most popular schools including Mount
Ridley College, Mother Teresa Catholic Primary School & Hume Anglican Grammar.

Description:
THE PERFECT STARTER
Start kicking lifestyle goals in this north facing comfortable brick home in a highly desirable pocket of Craigieburn. Just moments from parklands, Highlands Shopping Centre, Hume Anglican Grammar, Mt Ridley College and major arterial roads, this family home will be a popular one amongst first home buyers and savvy investors alike.
Showcasing a free flowing and functional floorplan, comprising of four carpeted bedrooms, all with built in robes and serviced by a central modern bathroom. The master bedroom entails an ensuite and walk in robe. The centerpiece of this family home is the expansive light filled kitchen/living domain, hosting an array of quality 900ml appliances, dishwasher, walk in pantry and a wealth of bench space making meal preparation easy and also having the luxury of stepping straight out to a spacious backyard.
Other features include: ducted heating, evaporative cooling and double garage with remote control and drive through access.
Insights: 14 Pearce Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Offers accepted due to Government change.
The signature style and emphasis on excellence that you expect from a former display home become beautifully clear throughout the faultlessly presented proportions of this designer family residence. The tone is set by elegant exterior lines and a welcoming hall that leads to a superb central living/dining domain and a refined lounge, each with its own distinct character, both enhanced by a fabulous integrated two way fire-place. Four bedrooms and two beautifully finished bathrooms include the ensuite to a main bedroom, with walk-in robes, that highlights the homes consummate luxury.
An open-plan kitchen featuring stone benches, stainless steel appliances and a walk-in pantry serves in style while a bright rumpus room adds to the family focus of spaces that flow to a sublime alfresco pavilion where decked surfaces, leafy privacy and an integrated barbeque bring your favourite holiday resort to mind. Walk to Highlands Shopping Centre and Highlands Hotel, reach Mount Ridley College and Malcolm Creek parkland in moments from this outstanding address accompanied by landscaped environs that include a secure double garage, and additional features including Refrigerated Cooling, CCTV and Vacuum maid.
Insights: 16 Asbury Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Instantly Appealing in a Prized Location
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all. Comprising of ducted heating & evaporative cooling, kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher over looking the meals/family room area, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, formal lounge, quality window furnishings, remote control double lock up garage with internal access plus much more. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight, complete with under cover alfresco & Wood Fire oven surrounded by low maintenance landscaped gardens. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With the land size of 603m2 (approximately) and all the amenities close by including a short stroll to Highlands Lake, Aitken Creek, Craigieburn Central shopping centre, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!
Insights: 5 Armadale Road, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
4 YEARS YOUNG....
Here is a wonderful opportunity for the young family and investors seeking modern design and convenience. Nestled in the quiet pockets of Craigieburn this beautifully presented family home will definitely tick all your boxes. Surrounded by an abundance of local amenities such as Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, schools, childcare facilities, restaurants, Splash Aqua Park and Leisure Centre, Hume Library, park lands, transport and much more.
The home offers:
# Master Bedroom with WIR
# 2 bedrooms with BIR
# Open plan (Living | Dining)
# Kitchen with stainless steel appliances
# Central Bathroom and Toilet
# Separate laundry
# Double lock up Garage
Extra's Include:
# Ducted Heating & spilt Aircon
# Landscaping
# Downlights
Please contact Nada Hanna on 0404 804 542 to arrange your inspection today. Properties with this character & location do not last long. Photo ID will be required at all inspections.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.
Insights: 35 Mountleigh Circuit, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Endless Possibilities on 650m2*
Bathed in natural light, this 3 bedroom home (master with ensuite), offers a functional floor plan in an enviable location.
Upon entry you are greeted with a formal front lounge, leading through to a well-appointed kitchen overlooking the family/meals area, central bathroom, large outdoor entertaining area, oversized private backyard & ample off-street parking space.
Ideally positioned in one of the most convenient & sought after pockets of Craigieburn, this home is close to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, public transport, Craigieburn Road, Willmott Park Primary School & much more.
Further features include; heating, cooling, carport with roller door & so much more!
Explore the potential this home has to offer whether you're a home buyer, investor, or future developer (STCA) - Call now!
Insights: 29 Watford Crescent, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
